mapper.update: update info_cust_combo set customer_id = #{customerId}, combo01 = #{combo01}, combo02 = #{combo02}, combo03 = #{combo03}, combo04 = #{combo04}, combo05 = #{combo05}, combo06 = #{combo06}, combo07 = #{combo07}, combo08 = #{combo08}, combo09 = #{combo09}, combo10 = #{combo10}, combo11 = #{combo11}, combo12 = #{combo12}, combo13 = #{combo13}, combo14 = #{combo14}, combo15 = #{combo15}, combo16 = #{combo16}, combo17 = #{combo17}, combo18 = #{combo18}, combo19 = #{combo19}, combo20 = #{combo20}, rec_version = #{recVersion} where customer_id = #{customerId};
